metadata.description: The Company Prefix that will be at the beginning of each resource in Azure. Usually the same as the Company Domain in Active Directory.  (Must be 8 or less characters in length)
The Local Admin Password for the Virtual Machines.  (Must be at least 12 character long)
The Address Space of the Companies network on VMware
The Shared Key for the VPN Connection between VMware and Azure.  (Must be at least 10 character long)
This is just for reference this does not affect this deployment.
Do you want to create an Availability Set (Puts the DCs on separate hosts to avoid downtime)
The Number of Domain Controller Servers (DC) to provision.

If you want a custom name for the Domain Controllers. Enter the name you want after the <Company_Prefix> ie. <Compnay_Prefix>-XXXXXXXX  Enter the name inside [] and put '' around the name, if you have more than one, put a comma in between.  i.e  ['SRV-01','SRV-02'] -- By Default leaving this blank will create the machines with   <Company_Prefix>-DC-XX   (where XX is the Server number)
The Size of the Domain Controller Server (DC) provisioned.
The Type of Domain Controller (DC) VM to be provisioned. (Standard_LRS = HDD / Premium_LRS = SSD)
The Windows version for the Domain Controllers.
The number of Extra Data Disks to add onto a Domain Controller?  NOTE: This will only add them to the first Domain Controller if more than one is provisioned.
The Size of the extra Data Disk in Gigabytes (GB).
The Number of RDS Servers (RDS) to provision.

If you want a custom name for the RDS Servers. The Number of File Servers (FS) to provision.
